name: TEST: Maze Generation, AI, Pathfinding AI
name_original: TEST: Maze Generation, AI, Pathfinding AI
description:
This is mainly a portfolio piece. This is mainly just a test of random maze generating and AI.
It contains AI that should work,  all three different types of AI are different, one uses the A* algorithm for pathfinding.

Use numbers 1, 2, and 3 on your keyboard to spawn them!
